title: As DoD grows more reliant on space industry, it needs to define the relationship
summary: DoD and the intelligence community are laying out requirements for how they would use commercial space systems during wartime

title: NASA to Provide Media Update on Demonstration Test, Artemis I Mission
summary: NASA will hold a media teleconference at 12:30 p.m. EDT Friday, Sept. 23, to discuss the cryogenic demonstration test conducted Wednesday, Sept. 21, ahead of the next Artemis I launch attempt.

title: Marlink plans to offer Starlink to maritime customers
summary: Marlink announced that it will provide Starlink internet service to its maritime and enterprise customers according to a report from Smart Maritime...

title: Mangata seeks permission to connect UK user terminals
summary: Mangata Networks, a U.S. satellite startup founded by a former OneWeb executive, has applied for a U.K. license to connect broadband terminals to its planned multi-orbit constellation.

title: Marlink to offer Starlink to maritime and enterprise customers
summary: Maritime connectivity specialist Marlink will offer Starlink to its customers as SpaceX’s broadband service turns to partners to expand beyond the consumer market.
